TopicTitle: Game freeze when I enter the training "Construction Basics" twice

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version: v1.0.2.842 Windows 32-bit** 

**What Happens: Game freeze when I enter the training "Construction Basics" twice**

**Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock**

**Steps to Replicate:**

**1) enter** **the training "Construction Basics"**

**2) follow directions until the last one**

**3) Press launch icon instead of quit icon** 

**4)** **enter** **the training "Construction Basics" again**

**Result: Game will freeze with no response**
Hi jiangtiandao, this is not reproducible on Linux, can you please post your game logs after the freeze occurs.

> 
> Hi jiangtiandao, this is not reproducible on Linux, can you please post your game logs after the freeze occurs.

Here is the logs 

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/j55jkp8g2qr99iz/Kerbal%20Space%20Program_log.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/j55jkp8g2qr99iz/Kerbal%20Space%20Program_log.zip?dl=0)

I found this, and I thought it was the cause.

    [EXC 17:51:30.932] IsolatedStorageException: Could not find a part of the path "E:\SteamLibrary\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program1-0-2\Kerbal Space Program\thumbs\training\A_VesselConstruction__Untitled Space Craft.png".	System.IO.FileStream..ctor (System.String path, FileMode mode, FileAccess access, FileShare share, Int32 bufferSize, Boolean anonymous, FileOptions options)	System.IO.FileStream..ctor (System.String path, FileMode mode, FileAccess access, FileShare share, Int32 bufferSize)	System.IO.File.Create (System.String path, Int32 bufferSize)	System.IO.File.Create (System.String path)	System.IO.File.WriteAllBytes (System.String path, System.Byte[] bytes)	CraftThumbnail.TakeSnaphot (.ShipConstruct ship, Int32 resolution, System.String saveFolder, System.String craftName, Single elevation, Single azimuth, Single pitch, Single hdg, Single fovFactor)	ShipConstruction.CaptureThumbnail (.ShipConstruct ship, System.String baseFolder, System.String thumbURL)	ShipConstruction.SaveShip (System.String shipFilename)	EditorLogic.onSaveConfirm ()	EditorLogic.saveShip (.Callback afterSave)	EditorLogic.saveShip ()[ERR 17:51:31.685] [DestructibleBuilding]: ID for this building is not defined correctly. Cannot unregister.

But I get the same and it's not freezing, can you please do a file cache verification and try again.

I have done a file cache verification but that still exists.

Maybe it's a platform only issue?

Maybe, if it is I don't think there's a way around it, apart from not running the tutorial twice in one session.

If you want to file it as a bug though [**please see here**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-!!!-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-!!!-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide?p=1380978&viewfull=1#post1380978) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
